pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering Big Data using Expectation Maximization Star (EM*) Algorithm // Implements the Improved Expectation Maximisation EM* and the traditional EM algorithm for clustering big data (gaussian mixture models for both multivariate and univariate datasets). This version implements the faster alternative-EM* that expedites convergence via structure based data segregation. The implementation supports both random and K-means++ based initialization. Reference: Parichit Sharma, Hasan Kurban, Mehmet Dalkilic (2022) doi:10.1016/j.softx.2021.100944. Hasan Kurban, Mark Jenne, Mehmet Dalkilic (2016) doi:10.1007/s41060-017-0062-1.
